item.title: GIMP Colour Exchange
item.author: Author
item.description: Jibber Jabber Only want instructions, skip the jibber jabber… A friend recently asked for some advice regarding some colour combinations. Below is an example of what he showed us I gave my thoughts, namely that light text on the light background wasn’t a very easy to read combination and I suggested that maybe Quote You could do white or black text and get that “popping” effect on all colours.
